00125     public function init()
00126     {
00127         //  See if this is a deauth...
00128         $this->_isDeauthRequest = ( false !== strpos( $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'], 'app/deauthorize' ) );
00129 
00130         if ( isset( $_REQUEST['request_ids'] ) )
00131         {
00132             $this->actionInviteComplete( 'request_ids' );
00133             $this->redirect( '/' );
00134         }
00135 
00136         parent::init();
00137 
00138         //  Get our identity
00139         $this->_identity = PS::_gs( 'currentIdentity' );
00140 
00141         //  Handle an rss feed
00142         if ( isset( $_REQUEST[ 'rss' ] ) )
00143         {
00144             header( "Content-Type: application/xml; charset=ISO-8859-1" );
00145             echo $this->_getRssFeed();
00146             die();
00147         }
00148 
00149         //  No facebook?
00150         if ( PS::_gs( 'standalone' ) || PS::o( $_REQUEST, 'standalone' ) )
00151             PS::_ss( 'standalone', true );
00152 
00153         //  Set up events...
00154         $this->onFacebookLogin = array( $this, 'facebookLogin' );
00155 
00156         //  Ignore ajax requests...
00157         if ( ! Yii::app()->getRequest()->getIsAjaxRequest() )
00158         {
00159             //  Set up the Facebook API
00160             $this->_initializeFacebook();
00161         }
00162     }

00210     public function actionAdmin()
00211     {
00212         $this->layout = 'admin';
00213         if ( null !== ( $_user = PS::_gs( 'currentUser' ) ) )
00214             $this->render( ( $_user && $_user->admin_level_nbr != 0 ) ? 'admin' : 'index' );

00220     public function actionInviteComplete( $queryParam = 'ids' )
00221     {
00222         if ( defined( 'PYE_TRACE_LEVEL' ) && PYE_TRACE_LEVEL > 3 )
00223             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Invite complete: ' . print_r( $_REQUEST, true ) );
00224 
00225         //  $_POST['ids'] is an array of invited friends...
00226         if ( null !== ( $_user = PS::_gs( 'currentUser' ) ) )
00227         {
00228             $_user->invite_count_nbr += count( PS::o( $_REQUEST, $queryParam, array() ) );
00229             $_user->update( array( 'invite_count_nbr' ) );
00230         }
00231 
00232         $this->redirect( PS::_gp( 'appUrl' ) );
00233     }

00239     public function actionDeauthorize()
00240     {
00241         if ( defined( 'PYE_TRACE_LEVEL' ) && PYE_TRACE_LEVEL > 3 )
00242             CPSLog::trace( __METHOD__, 'Deauth request: ' . print_r( $_REQUEST, true ) );
00243 
00244         $this->layout = false;
00245 
00246         //  Reset!
00247         if ( null !== ( $_user = PS::_gs( 'currentUser' ) ) )
00248         {
00249             $_user->app_del_date = date( 'Y-m-d H:i:s' );
00250             $_user->app_del_count_nbr += 1;
00251             $_user->access_token_text = null;
00252             $_user->session_key_text = null;
00253             $_user->update( array( 'app_del_date', 'app_del_count_nbr', 'access_token_text', 'session_key_text' ) );
00254         }
00255     }

00268     public function actionError()
00269     {
00270         if ( $error = Yii::app()->errorHandler->error )
00271         {
00272             if ( Yii::app()->request->isAjaxRequest )
00273             {
00274                 $this->layout = false;
00275                 echo $error['message'];
00276                 return;
00277             }
00278 
00279             $this->render( 'error', $error );
00280         }

00306     public function getFbUserName( $fbUserId )
00307     {
00308         try
00309         {
00310             if ( $this->_identity && $this->_identity->getFBUserId() == $fbUserId )
00311                 return 'You';
00312 
00313             $_user = json_decode( file_get_contents( 'https://graph.facebook.com/' . $fbUserId ) );
00314 
00315             if ( $_user )
00316                 return trim( $_user->first_name . ' ' . $_user->last_name );
00317         }
00318         catch ( Exception $_ex )
00319         {
00320         }
00321 
00322         return 'Facebook User';
00323     }

00333     protected function _initializeFacebook()
00334     {
00335         //  Create the api object
00336         $this->_facebookApi = PS::_gco( 'facebook' );
00337 
00338         //  Get the login url
00339         $this->_loginUrl = $this->_facebookApi->getLoginUrl(
00340             array(
00341                 'canvas' => self::IS_CANVAS,
00342                 'fbconnect' => self::IS_CONNECT,
00343                 'req_perms' => $this->_facebookApi->getAppPermissions(),
00344             )
00345         );
00346 
00347         PS::_ss(
00348             '_currentIdentity',
00349             $this->_identity = new CPSFacebookUserIdentity(
00350                 $this->_facebookApi,
00351                 $this->_loginUrl,
00352                 $this->_userModelClass
00353             )
00354         );
00355     }
